about.about: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only astronomical object known to harbor life. According to radiometric dating estimation and other evidence, Earth formed over 4.5 billion years ago. Earth is the densest planet in the Solar System and the largest and most massive of the four innermost rocky planets.
about.name: The modern English word Earth developed, via Middle English, from an Old English noun most often spelled eor√∞e. Occasionally, the name Terra is used in scientific writing and especially in science fiction to distinguish our inhabited planet from others.
